A reporter asked head coach Lionel Hollins how he was going to`` manage minutes'' between Michael Oher and Greivis Vásquez .`` It's not about managing minutes,'' he said. Only one of those guys is going to play. In other words, Greivis Vásquez is still the backup point guard. At some point, Michael Oher will get a chance to take the job.
